thread.section_title: Art Hotel Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Anniversary
thread.title_full: Anniversary - Review of Art Hotel Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Susn O
title: Anniversary
text: W arrived at the hotel early but our room is not yet ready . We checked in our luggage in the front desk . They told us to get lunch and comeback .when we came back they told us that they upgraded our room to the view of the Eiffel Tower without any additional fare. The hotel was across the train station so, It's easy to hop in and go. The room was just right for us , bathroom was clean . The breakfast was good. We stayed on Jan 2016 , for 4-5 day I think to celebrate my husband birthday and our 30th anniversary . Overall stay at this hotel , I will recommend it .
